channel.title: [WHITELIST][TEKKIT][SURIVIAL][GREAT COMMUNITY] NationCraft!
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Welcome to NationCraft![/size] [size=18pt]Equivilant Exchange is Donor Only[/size]
We are a small tekkit server based around making towns and nations and making them thrive! We have a whitelist to maintain a small and friendly community. We welcome new people to join us in our server of fun!
The aim of the server: Create an evironment based around making nations Small community so everyone knows everyone Friendly people Everyone to play survival, even owners Create heated debates and a politics on the server
The players aim: Set up or join a big town Make big factories Sell all of your extra materials to the World Market Keep good relations with other nations and towns Become a nation Have fun with friends!
Rules No EXCESSIVE swearing No Hacking/Duping/Glitching of ANY SORT No Griefing UNLESS at a specified war No abusing anyone No nuking near spawn No advertising No theft No pointless wars
How do I join the server? EASY! Just leave a application here with the following details:
In-Game-Name: Do you have tekkit: Age: Time Zone: Do you like having fun?: Will you attempt to check this post daily to see if you have been accepted:
If you pass the application we will send you with a PM of the IP! Along with a notification on this thread.

item.title: [WHITELIST][TEKKIT][SURIVIAL][GREAT COMMUNITY] NationCraft!
item.dc:creator: @dazzyayan dazzyayan
item.description:
@dazzyayan wrote:

[size=24pt]Welcome to NationCraft![/size]
[size=18pt]Equivilant Exchange is Donor Only[/size]

We are a small tekkit server based around making towns and nations and making them thrive! We have a whitelist to maintain a small and friendly community. We welcome new people to join us in our server of fun!

The aim of the server:
Create an evironment based around making nations
Small community so everyone knows everyone
Friendly people
Everyone to play survival, even owners
Create heated debates and a politics on the server

The players aim:
Set up or join a big town
Make big factories
Sell all of your extra materials to the World Market
Keep good relations with other nations and towns
Become a nation
Have fun with friends!

Rules
No EXCESSIVE swearing
No Hacking/Duping/Glitching of ANY SORT
No Griefing UNLESS at a specified war
No abusing anyone
No nuking near spawn
No advertising
No theft
No pointless wars

How do I join the server?
EASY! Just leave a application here with the following details:

In-Game-Name:
Do you have tekkit:
Age:
Time Zone:
Do you like having fun?:
Will you attempt to check this post daily to see if you have been accepted:

If you pass the application we will send you with a PM of the IP! Along with a notification on this thread.

Read full topic
